name: GKAgentDelegate
desc: Implement this protocol to synchronize the state of an agent with its visual representation in your game.

items.name: func agentWillUpdate(GKAgent)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that an agent is about to perform its next simulation step.

items.name: func agentDidUpdate(GKAgent)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that an agent has just performed a simulation step.
